item.title: In pictures: ‘Stop Trump’ protesters target JD Vance’s UK summer trip
item.description: U.K. locals staged a protest against JD Vance's summer UK trip, saying that the vice president was not welcome.

item.title: Putin wants a photo op with Trump and a sanctions delay, says EU foreign policy chief
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin and his U.S. counterpart Donald Trump are set to meet this week to discuss the war in Ukraine.

item.title: China says it 'drove away' U.S. warship near the disputed Scarborough Shoal
item.description: This comes after a Chinese warship crashed into one of its own country's coast guard vessels as it chased a patrol boat belonging to the Philippines

item.title: White House tames expectations for Trump-Putin summit
item.description: The White House has now reduced the upcoming Alaska summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and Kremlin leader Vladimir Putin to a "listening exerc...

item.title: European powers threaten 'snapback sanctions' if Iran doesn't return to nuclear talks
item.description: Tehran has said it remains open to restarting direct talks with the U.S., but stopped short of accepting the terms to abandon its uranium enrichment p...
